name: UPHB Moodle Dark Theme (v.0.5.1)(Released!)
description: So Perpetualites like you don't die from blue light.
additional_info:
v0.5.1
- Released!
- Fixed another part of the text (bold)

v0.5
- Table borders now show up properly in Forum Lists.
- borders in course lists are now darkened.
- borders in profile menu are now darkened.
- darkened some leftover orange buttons.
- Profile Settings headers are now darkened.
- Heading settings in online text submissions are darkened.
- Timezone setting in Profile Settings is darkened
- Clicking Files in File submissions no longer flashes white if clicked.



v0.4.3
-Text has now the inherit tag which will stop it from loading with the default background value (#fff)
-Tables are now dark.

v0.4.2
- Text is mostly fixed now
- Added 1 pixel of shadows to certain text so it's readable in presentations.
- Quiz Numbers is fixed.
- White transitioning to red area from the Quiz timer if timer goes to 15 seconds is now dark.
- Blinding error about Quizzes being not allowed to be reviewed are now dark.
- Connection Alerts on quizzes are now fixed.
- Buttons that are left out in File Picker are now dark

v0.4.1
- Text now mostly share a single color and will no longer blend in with the dark (mostly.) 
- Incorrect enrollment key error is now dark 
- Users who do not give permission to view their details to students no longer destroy your eyesight. 
- For once, submission boxes finally does not jumpscare you with 255 levels of RGB 
- Alert regarding drafts being saved is now dark. 
- Dialogue Boxes can now be read without wearing sunglasses 
- submission boxes no longer jumpscare you with 255 levels of RGB 
- Special Tools in submission are now dark. 
- Equation Editor buttons are now dark. 
- File Picker, also dark.
